titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 8 through April 12, 2019, as "National Assistant Principals Week".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 8 through April 12, 2019, as "National Assistant Principals Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution (1) supports the designation of April 8-April 12, 2019, as National Assistant Principals Week, and (2) honors the contributions of assistant principals to the success of students in the United States.
